challenges.header: How Salazar solves real-world IT challenges
challenges.paragraph: Salazar adapts to your environment and priorities—delivering value across teams, systems and enterprise risk management frameworks.
challenges.paragraph-2: Don't let these challenges slow you down

card-1.header: Know your real RPO and RTO risk
card-1.subheader: When you don't know your RPO and RTO, you don' t know your risk.
card-1.paragraph:
Salazar shows how much data you could lose (RPO) and how long each service would take to recover (RTO). 
When you know your RPO and RTO, you can act—improving recovery strategies and strengthening enterprise risk management. 
Whether you're managing a virtual machine, a database, or a file system, you'll always know how protected it is—and where to improve.

card-2.subheader: Map technical assets to logical services and enable smarter operations.
card-2.paragraph:
Salazar links RPO metrics to business services, enriching your CMDB and ITSM. 
Align recovery capabilities with service priorities across IT and business teams. 
Empower IT Managers, CISOs, and Service Managers to act proactively through system self-remediation.

card-3.header: Make Decisions Based on Real Exposure
card-3.paragraph:
Salazar helps prioritize recovery strategies and infrastructure investments based on real exposure. 
Spot weak points, underprotected assets, or backup misconfigurations—and act before incidents turn into outages. 
That's daily governance, not reactive firefighting.

card-1.title: CONNECT
card-1.description: Seamlessly ingest metadata from backup systems such as **NetBackup**, **Commvault**, **Cohesity**, **Veeam**, snapshots and business services definitions from **CMDB**s via **secure API**s.
card-1.subtitle: Connector-first, agentless approach that consolidates backup signals without touching production workloads.

card-2.title: MAP
card-2.description: Translate raw assets into **business services** — applications, dependencies and recovery chains — so you see **recoverability** where the business lives.
card-2.subtitle: Automatic dependency mapping and visual service models give you the service-level context you need.

card-3.title: GOVERN
card-3.description: **Continuously validate** protection quality, ensure policy alignment, and keep your backup posture **compliant** and **accountable**.
card-3.subtitle: Actionable governance with continuous monitoring, clear compliance reports, and integrations with ticketing and automation tools.

form.subheader: Whether you're a lean IT team managing global infrastructure or a large organization aiming for full compliance, Salazar gives you enterprise-grade visibility without the complexity.
form.paragraph:
Don't wait for the next audit—or outage. 
Start governing your backup strategy today.

question-1.title: Does Salazar replace my backup solution?
question-1.description: Salazar is a Governance and Risk Management tool that shows current recoverability level of the organization unifying RPO/RTO from different backup systems.

question-2.title: Can Salazar trigger remediation?
question-2.description: Salazar doesn't remediate, it exposes gaps through APIs. ITSM tools can easily integrate and take actions.

question-3.title: Does it support multiple backup vendors?
question-3.description: Yes. Salazar support several backup software vendors allowing to add new data sources, backup systems, etc..

question-4.title: Does it assess replication?
question-4.description: Not today. Salazar focuses on recoverability from backups—the last‑resort foundation for recovery.

question-5.title: How does it handle RTO?
question-5.description: Salazar estimates the potential RTO based on the asset's longest full image backup time. It then calculates the RTO for each asset and flags any misalignment with the RTO declared for the corresponding services.
